rule-21-6-a.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones and two spaces.  Baseline ruleset project description has utilizes system 7 with two boilers staged based on load. Boiler 1 is staged before Boiler 2.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), and is modeled with two boilers, each boiler shall be staged based on load.

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), and is modeled with two boilers, each boiler shall be staged based on load.
